# Image.PreviewGroup 能支持配置模式吗

`📝 Documentation`,`Inactive`

### What problem does this feature solve?

在 Upload 组件中集成 PreviewGroup 组件实现点击略缩图的预览功能

### What does the proposed API look like?

```tsx
type ImageItem = {
    src: string
    // ... other properties
}
<Image.PreviewGroup  items=[ImageItem] />
```
